alert.note: Alert for Estill; Powell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 05 at 7:06AM EST until February 06 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky... Red River at Clay City affecting Powell and Estill Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Red River at Clay City. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Low lying areas flood. Maple street near the Red River Ranch as well as Pompeii Road off of Highway 15 are impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:15 AM EST Saturday the stage was 17.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 6:15 AM EST Saturday was 17.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is near crest and is expected to begin to recede this morning and fall below flood stage this evening. The river will run high into the day on Sunday. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. The next statement will be issued 6 PM EST this evening.
